backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and per-user manga entries with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI changes to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing main frontend files and their roles across layout, auth, manga features, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for root-level frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and main script with a root mount element.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache management, precaching, runtime caching strategies, and cache clearing messaging.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup, service worker registration, and rendering the manga list.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Login/logout button that manages identity, clears caches, and handles login edge cases.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to enter their name and create a profile using a form submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with a collapsible sticky header, login/logout control, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist documenting viewport-specific layout and scrolling behaviors to verify the Add Manga dialog remains accessible and constrained across devices.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: React dialog component for creating new manga entries, handling form state, genre management, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that auto-scrolls overflowing title text vertically with pause-on-hover behavior.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: Hover-based draggable popup showing cover art and rotating titles, with persistent on-screen position and outside-click closing.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Field component for uploading, previewing, and removing manga cover images with upload progress handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog for editing existing manga entries, tracking field changes and submitting only modified fields to the backend.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Simple dialog for editing manga notes with backend readiness checks and save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Wrapper panel that toggles a collapsible filters/search section and renders MangaListControls inside a sticky UI container.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in a 3‑column grid with auto‑measured row widths and checkbox toggles; shows a fallback when no genres exist.
Interactive card showing manga details, cover, rating, chapters, notes, and bookmark actions with backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides input fields and popovers for searching, filtering, sorting, genre selection, and adding manga entries.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga listing page handling data loading, filtering, sorting, pagination, alignment, and backend connection state.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Renders a MangaCard with edit/delete controls and dialogs, managing mutation states for editing and deleting entries.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Portal‑based overlay that shows a centered preview of notes when visible.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Pagination UI with numbered pages, ellipses, and previous/next buttons based on total pages and current page.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: Provides a React context for a singleton backend connection and a hook to access it, ensuring only one connection instance is created.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps the singleton backend connection to expose actor readiness, errors, retries, and connection state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries from the backend with caching, authentication checks, retry logic, and fallback to offline caches.
Manages backend actor creation with retries, timeouts, readiness checks, diagnostics, and identity-change handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Provides access to the global backend connection context to enforce a single connection loop.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Exposes simplified backend readiness state derived from the singleton connection hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Returns a cached cover image URL from IndexedDB when available and fetches/cache it in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the current user's profile with backend readiness checks and invalidates profile queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence via a React provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Extracts and alphabetizes unique genres from all manga entries returned by useGetAllMangaEntries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Defines React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and editing manga entries with backend readiness and error classification handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: Provides a hook to persist, restore, clamp, and update popup window position using localStorage and resize handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: Calculates a uniform width for watchlist rows by measuring child widths, observing size changes, and remeasuring on dependencies or image loads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and custom utilities like gold and rainbow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Registers a service worker on load and provides a helper to clear its cache via postMessage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories with retry logic and user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Defines a standard backend-not-ready message and assertion to enforce backend readiness.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: IndexedDB helpers for opening stores and performing get, put, delete, and key listing operations for caching.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: IndexedDB cache for cover image blobs with composite keys and functions to get, store, fetch, and clear images per principal.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage cache for manga metadata with serialization, deserialization, read, write, and clear functions.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: IndexedDB-backed manga metadata cache namespaced per principal, supporting read, write, clear and entry serialization.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides timeout-wrapped promises and a TimeoutError class for enforcing hard async operation time limits.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements exponential backoff retry logic with optional time limits, per-attempt timeouts, and a retry manager.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, existing UI features, and pending feature requests related to arrow positioning and a collapsible header. Includes metadata such as schema version, project info, and requirement mappings.
